contexts.context: An infant is seen from behind. Looking <mark>closely</mark>, the image was made with a different type...
...know so I kiss him there and hold him <mark>close</mark> just because I love him so.
...been mentioned before, but he appears he is a <mark>close</mark> friend of the Behrends. I remember that around...
...; it was somber, likely from losing someone <mark>close</mark>, and now she's drawn something silly about rabbits...
